title: [Merited Metalworks]
description: Ring-shaped racks of striated sandalwood are affixed across the shop, the displays woven in zigzag configurations of colorful rope bound in tonal wires.  A brass-channeled counter sits before a mural of jewel-inset blossoms, the elongated faenor-forged leaves curved upwards to serve as makeshift containers for wares, the sharp edges cushioned by strips of metallic velvet.  Perforated sconces cast illuminated stars across the tiled floor, the flames highlighting the marbled mosaic.
